snippet: A board remains in lock step with Rupert Murdoch, despite a growing storm of investigations into a phone-hacking scandal and an ensuing cover-up by senior officials.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column observes the board of News Corp remains in lock step with Rupert Murdoch, despite a growing storm of investigations into a phone-hacking scandal and an ensuing cover-up by senior officials; contends that the primary reason Murdoch has not been held to account is that the board has no independence, little influence and no stomach for confronting its chairman.
lead_paragraph: A board remains in lock step with Rupert Murdoch, despite a growing storm of investigations into a phone-hacking scandal and an ensuing cover-up by senior officials.

headline.seo: The Cozy Compliance of the News Corp. Board
headline.main: The Cozy Compliance of the News Corp. Board

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
